 2022-13262022-12-15,  ,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Approving the Convention Concerning the Elimination of Violence and Harassment in the World of Work
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to bring into force for Canada the Convention concerning the ELIMINATION OF VIOLENCE AND HARASSMENT IN THE WORLD OF WORK, adopted at Geneva on June 21, 2019.
